intents.text: Create PO for vendor VENDOR-BLUE amount 1200 sku SKU-100 qty 5
Create PO for vendor VENDOR-RED amount 2500 sku BLOCKED-SKU-1 qty 12
Check inventory for sku SKU-ALPHA qty 2
Create purchase order for vendor VENDOR-GREEN amount 800 sku SKU-777 qty 15
Check inventory stock for sku SKU-BETA qty 9
Create PO for vendor VENDOR-ORANGE amount 300 sku SKU-123 qty 2
Check inventory for sku SKU-GAMMA qty 20

policies.inlinePolicyYaml:
version: "v1"
defaults:
  confidenceThreshold: 0.7
  execution:
    autoRequires: ["WARN"]
rules:
  - id: "inline-max-invoice-amount"
    enabled: true
    priority: 95
    appliesTo:
      intentTypes: ["REVIEW_INVOICE"]
    constraints:
      - type: "MAX_AMOUNT"
        params:
          max: 25000
    decision: "DENY"
    reason: "Inline policy caps invoice auto-review."
    tags: ["finance", "guardrail"]
  - id: "inline-blocked-vendor"
    enabled: true
    priority: 85
    appliesTo:
      intentTypes: ["CREATE_PO"]
    constraints:
      - type: "VENDOR_BLOCKLIST"
        params:
          vendors: ["VENDOR-BLACK"]
    decision: "DENY"
    reason: "Inline policy blocks VENDOR-BLACK."
    tags: ["compliance"]
